sentences.en: " All's well that ends well,'said the Warden casually.
sentences.cn: “ 找到它就好了. ” 水保随便那么说着.

sentences.en: " I understand,'said the Warden. " Everyone needs one.
sentences.cn: 水保说: “ 明白明白. 都应当有一把,我懂你这个话. ”

sentences.en: A new warden took over the prison.
sentences.cn: 一位新的监狱长接管了这所监狱。

sentences.en: A traffic warden asked him to move his car.
sentences.cn: 交通管理员让他把车开走。

sentences.en: He is the warden of an old people's home.
sentences.cn: 他是一家养老院的管理员.

sentences.en: He was a warden at the local parish church.
sentences.cn: 他是本地教区教堂的管理员。

sentences.en: Madam wondered why the Warden was coming.
The retiring warden delivered over the keys of the prison to his successor.
sentences.cn: 即将退休的监狱长把监狱的钥匙移交给继任者.

sentences.en: The search party came at midnight, led by the Warden.
sentences.cn: 查船的在半夜时, 由水保领来了.

sentences.en: the warden of a youth hostel
The Warden saw that his host had eaten none.
sentences.cn: 因为水保见到主人并不剥栗子吃.

sentences.en: The warden took us to a vantage point on the slopes where we saw herring gulls on the rocks below.
sentences.cn: 管理员把我们带到斜坡上的一处有利位置，我们从那里看到了下面岩石上的银鸥。

sentences.en: They were taken to the warden's office.
sentences.cn: 他们被带到了监察员的办公室.

sentences.en: We wanted to park in front of the bank, but the traffic warden moved us on.
sentences.cn: 我们想在银行前面停车, 可交通监察员却把我们驱走了.

sentences.en: With the river in spate, the Warden was extra busy.
sentences.cn: 涨了河水, 不保比一时似乎忙多了.

words.tran_cn: 区长；看守人；典狱官；学监

trans.tran_cn: 看守人，看门人，[史]州长，县长，典狱官，<英>校长
trans.tran_en: the person in charge of a prison
